name: stebe Demo
description:
Build Something With CobBle and Choose Any Biomes Such As Dessert And Plains, In Classic Mode There are three Biomes Such As Snow Island, Dessert and Plains...  Imagine With CobBle, Build Houses, Build Anything...

How To Play: 

*Building:

Swipe Down, Up, Left, Right To Put Block

And Tap Once To Break A Block

*Control:

Joystick1: Move Left and Right

Joystick2: Move Up and Down
